languages.text: "Вот... вот здесь, по данным маячков, эти ашмаги держат украденный груз. Из "Амасекуса" через мостки и налево — там, в глубине, есть один дворик, через который можно на место добраться. Я буду ждать неподалеку — приходите как сможете, но чем быстрее, тем лучше. До встречи, шерин!"

traits.locale_text: "Вот... вот здесь, по данным маячков, эти ашмаги держат украденный груз. Я буду ждать неподалеку — приходите как сможете, но чем быстрее, тем лучше. До встречи, шерин!"

languages.text: "Right... Here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"
languages.original_text: "Вот... вот здесь, по данным маячков, эти ашмаги держат украденный груз. Из "Амасекуса" через мостки и налево — там, в глубине, есть один дворик, через который можно на место добраться. Я буду ждать неподалеку — приходите как сможете, но чем быстрее, тем лучше. До встречи, шерин!"

I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

languages.text: 「ここだよ…アッシュマグどもは、ここに盗んだ貨物を保管してる。バーを出て橋を渡り、左に曲がって…奥に進むと小さな中庭があって、そこからこの場所に行くことができるから。あたしは近くで待ってる。いつでも来てもらって大丈夫だけど、早ければ早いほどいいね。それじゃ後でね、シャリーン！」
languages.original_text: "Right... Here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: 「ここだよ…アッシュマグどもは、ここに盗んだ貨物を保管してる。バーを出て橋を渡り、左に曲がって…奥に進むと小さな中庭があって、そこからこの場所に行くことができるから。あたしは近くで待ってる。いつでも来てもらって大丈夫だけど、早ければ早いほどいいね。それじゃ後でね、シャリーン！」

languages.text: “嗯……就是这里，这就是那些坏种存放贼赃的地方。出了酒吧，上桥，向左转，一直走到最深处，穿过这个小院子就到了。我就在这附近等你，你看什么时候方便就过来吧，但当然是越早越好。那就到时见啦，亲爱的！”
languages.original_text: "Right... Here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: “嗯……就是这里，这就是那些坏家伙存放贼赃的地方。出了酒吧，上桥，向左转，一直走到最深处，穿过这个小院子就到了。我就在这附近等你，你看什么时候方便就过来吧，但当然是越早越好。那就到时见啦，亲爱的！”

languages.text: « Juste... là. C'est là que ces ashmags gardent la cargaison volée. Sortez du bar, traversez le pont et prenez à gauche. Vous trouverez dans les profondeurs une petite cour qui donne directement à cet endroit. Je vous attendrai dans le coin. Venez quand vous le pourrez, mais le plus tôt sera le mieux. À plus tard, shereen ! »
languages.original_text: "Right... Here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: « Juste... là. C'est là que ces ashmags gardent la cargaison volée. Sortez du bar, traversez le pont et prenez à gauche. Vous trouverez dans les profondeurs une petite cour qui donne directement à cet endroit. Je vous attendrai dans le coin. Venez quand vous le pourrez, mais le plus tôt sera le mieux. À plus tard, shereen ! »

languages.text: «Justo... aquí tienen guardado esos ashmag el cargamento robado. Fuera del bar, cruzando el puente y a la izquierda; allí, en las profundidades, encontrará un patio que, al atravesarlo, {mf|le|la} llevará al sitio. {mf|Le|La} estaré esperando cerca; puede venir cuando mejor le venga, pero cuanto antes mejor. ¡Hasta entonces, shereen!».
languages.original_text: "Right... Here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: «Justo... aquí tienen guardado esos ashmag el cargamento robado. Fuera del bar, cruzando el puente y a la izquierda; allí, en las profundidades, encontrará un patio que, al atravesarlo, {mf|le|la} llevará al sitio. {mf|Le|La} estaré esperando cerca; puede venir cuando mejor le venga, pero cuanto antes mejor. ¡Hasta entonces, shereen!».

languages.text: "Genau ... hier bewahren diese Ashmags die gestohlene Fracht auf. Einfach raus aus der Bar, über die Brücke und dann nach links ... dort, in den Tiefen, findet Ihr einen kleinen Innenhof, durch den Ihr ans Ziel gelangt. Ich werde in der Nähe warten ... Ihr könnt kommen, wann es Euch passt, aber je eher, desto besser. Wir sehen uns dann dort, Shereen!"
languages.original_text: "Right... Here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: "Genau ... hier bewahren diese Ashmags die gestohlene Fracht auf. Einfach raus aus der Bar, über die Brücke und dann nach links ... dort, in den Tiefen, findet Ihr einen kleinen Innenhof, durch den Ihr ans Ziel gelangt. Ich werde in der Nähe warten ... Ihr könnt kommen, wann es Euch passt, aber je eher, desto besser. Wir sehen uns dann dort, Shereen!"

languages.original_text: "Right... here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out of the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

languages.text: "Bak, şurası... Külboğazlar, çaldıkları kargoyu burada tutuyor işte. Bardan çık, köprüyü geç, sonra sola dön... Yeterince ilerleyince saklandıkları yeri bulacağın ufak bir avluya çıkacaksın. Ben de yakınlarda seni bekliyor olacağım. Ne zaman istersen gelebilirsin ama ne kadar erken o kadar iyi. Hadi görüşürüz o hâlde şirinim!"
languages.original_text: "Right... Here, that's where those ashmags are keeping the stolen cargo. Out the bar, over the bridge, and to the left — there, in the depths, you'll find a small courtyard through which you can get to the place. I'll be waiting nearby — you can come when it suits you, but the sooner you do, the better. I'll see you then, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: "Tamam... İşte, o külboğazların çaldıkları kargoyu tuttukları yer burası. Bardan çık, köprüyü geç, sonra sola dön... Yeterince ilerleyince saklandıkları yeri bulacağın ufak bir avluya çıkacaksın. Ben de yakınlarda seni bekliyor olacağım.... Ne zaman istersen gelebilirsin ama ne kadar erken gelirsen o kadar iyi olur. Hadi görüşürüz o hâlde şirinim!"
